snippet: Facebook reported that about 30 percent of its total advertising revenue came from mobile devices, a significant jump from the last quarter.
abstract: Facebook's earnings offers early signs that company has cracked mobile revenue code, long a concern of investors; reports roughly 30 percent, or $375 million, of total advertising revenue coming from mobile devices, significant jump from previous quarter.
lead_paragraph: Facebook reported that about 30 percent of its total advertising revenue came from mobile devices, a significant jump from the last quarter.

headline.main: Mobile Ads Help Propel Earnings at Facebook
headline.print_headline: Mobile Ads Help Propel Earnings At Facebook
